sentences.english: All sounds are still only moments, the mood will be cheerful jump.
sentences.chinese: 只有万籁俱静的时刻，心绪才会欢快的跳跃。

sentences.english: You're in a multi-tasking frame of mind.
sentences.chinese: 你处在一种因处理太多事情而导致的心绪不宁中。

sentences.english: I am listless, I am a wanderer in my heart.
sentences.chinese: 我心绪不宁，我是自己心中的流浪者。

sentences.english: As soon as he began to enjoy the food his bladder made him distractive.
sentences.chinese: 他刚刚开动，就让膀胱搅得心绪不宁。

sentences.english: There are some things that may help you lift up your mood.
sentences.chinese: 这儿有些方法能帮助你改善你的心绪。

sentences.english: It steals our peace of mind and prevents us from finding solutions.
sentences.chinese: 焦虑令我们心绪不宁，妨碍我们找到解决问题的办法。

sentences.english: I am listless， I am a wanderer in my heart.
sentences.chinese: 我心绪不宁，我是自己心中的流浪者。

sentences.english: As the years rolled on, it bothered me that I never wrote that letter.
sentences.chinese: 年复一年，没有写那封信使得我心绪不宁。

sentences.english: Happy life lies in a peaceful mind.
sentences.chinese: 幸福的生活存在于心绪的宁静之中。

sentences.english: I have been strangely annoyed by the dream ever since.
sentences.chinese: 不知为何我从此一直被这场梦弄得心绪不宁。

sentences.english: So if you get up then, you may experience tension.
sentences.chinese: 所以如果在那时起来，你会感到心绪紧张。

sentences.english: By sitting with uncomfortable emotions, you can literally change your brain.
sentences.chinese: 心绪不良的坐卧真的会对你的脑部产生影响。

sentences.english: Things happened so fast that Mary was at sixes and sevens.
sentences.chinese: 事情发生得如此快，以致玛丽心绪烦乱。

sentences.english: His arrival put the girls in a flutter.
sentences.chinese: 他的到来使她心绪不宁。

sentences.english: These days I can scarcely feel calm.
sentences.chinese: 这些日子，我的心绪很难平静。

sentences.english: You may lean on a railing overlooking, flying mood, complexity and confusion of dust discard Jiuxiao .
sentences.chinese: 你可以凭栏远眺，放飞心绪，繁杂的纷尘抛却九霄。

definition: mind/state of mind/attention/(Chinese medicine) psychic constitution
to pacify/to calm down/to be cured/to be healed
to rage/to dash/to surge/also written 激盪|激荡
